fsrtool.name: fsrtool_ships
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_ships` ( `Id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `corpID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `typ` char(20) DEFAULT NULL, `name` char(32) DEFAULT NULL, `standort` char(10) DEFAULT NULL, `status` char(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'not ready', `versichert` char(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Nein', `versichert_bis` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `bemerkung` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, `player` char(32) DEFAULT NULL, `time` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `timeback` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tot` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `kblink` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`,`corpID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
